author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Goodix says is supplier to Samsung of fingerprint sensor for India
text:
May 2, 2018 / 9:08 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Goodix says is supplier to Samsung of fingerprint sensor for India Reuters Staff
STOCKHOLM, May 2 (Reuters) - Goodix:
* Says enters partnership with Samsung Electronics
* Says its fingerprint sensor has been commercialized on Samsungâ€™s new smartphone model Galaxy J7 Duo to deliver biometric solutions for consumers in India
* Goodix spokesman says it is its first collaboration with Samsung on fingerprint sensors, have worked together on display before (Reporting by Olof Swahnberg)
